Articles.Content: Does anyone know what file/files i need to edit in order to modify the kerbal booster pack... i kinda want to make the Kerbal booster pack into a jet pack and mod the values so i can actually fly on kerban
Id love to know this as well.
Pretty sure the jetpack and the kerbals are in their own package, in other words not editable outside of scripts or hacky techniques.
There\'s a part module each Kerbal has, and you could probably make an atmospheric version of that, but it whould be a hell to code.
So does anyone have a clue how to mod the crew?
